content:
Hi, I think cargo used to not print compiler warnings on deps inside the CARGO_HOME, right?
When I do a x.py clippy on the rust repo, I see a lot of these

warning: `serde` (lib) generated 1 warning (1 duplicate)
    Checking serde_json v1.0.59
    Checking semver v1.0.3
    Checking camino v1.0.5
    Checking cargo-platform v0.1.2
warning: `cargo-platform` (lib) generated 1 warning (1 duplicate)
    Checking toml v0.5.7
warning: `semver` (lib) generated 1 warning (1 duplicate)
    Checking url v2.2.2
warning: `camino` (lib) generated 1 warning (1 duplicate)
warning: `url` (lib) generated 1 warning (1 duplicate)
warning: `serde_json` (lib) generated 1 warning (1 duplicate)
    Checking cargo_metadata v0.14.0

which seems kinda strange...
